t: London Harness - Klaus Bosch Moving Sand Art
s: Klaus Bosch (aka Sandman) has been making his KB Collection Sand Art in Lustenau, Austria since 1988. He has a small crew of less than a dozen employees at his sand factory. Sandman’s sand art has been in the display windows (worldwide) of Louis Vuitton and Nordstroms.
